thread.title: Josh Richards plans to live on Mars by 2027
thread.title_full: Josh Richards plans to live on Mars by 2027

title: Josh Richards plans to live on Mars by 2027
text:
Josh Richards plans to live on Mars by 2027 Share Download (23.00 MB) MP3 available 23.00 MB 
Josh Richards is an official astronaut candidate with the Mars-One Consortium, which wants to send a group of people to Mars. 
Once there, they’ll set up a colony, with their own air and food supply. 
Josh trained in physics and psychology, and he works a combat engineer with the Australian and British armed forces. 
He's one of 100 candidates aiming to land on Mars by 2027. The group will eventually be whittled down to four. 
The plan is that they’ll leave for Mars… and never return.
